pageContext.title: Hunter Foundation Pale Ale
pageContext.description: This straight-up US style pale ale uses some of our favourite hops against a toasty malt base. We brewed this with Sir Tom Hunter at our Fraserburgh brewery - to add a charitable element to your own version, feel free to share this citrusy pale ale with your friends. Or don't, it's your choice.
pageContext.author: Sam Mason <samjbmason>
